metadata.title: CVE-2018-10875 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in ansible. ansible.cfg is read from the current working directory which can be altered to make it point to a plugin or a module path under the control of an attacker, thus allowing the attacker to execute arbitrary code.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-10875` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ansible - 2.6.1+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ansible package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.6.1+dfsg-1').
